snippet.title: Getting started with the OutSystems Agile Platform
snippet.description: In this series, Justin James chronicles using the OutSystems Agile Platform to write a real-world Web application. Part one covers his initial experiences with the Agile Platform.

snippet.title: Programming news: MicroFocus acquires Borland, Aleri integrates Coral8 engine with Windows HPC Server
snippet.description: Justin James highlights news about MicroFocus' acquisition of Borland and Compuware's testing business, AppStore apps must be iPhone 3.0 compliant, releases of Intentional Domain W...

snippet.title: Control your own destiny by using Google Sitemaps to drive traffic to your site
snippet.description: Google Sitemaps endeavors to improve how Google's Web crawlers discover new content on your site to make it more quickly available in Google searches.

snippet.title: No training budget? Try these five free tutorial sites
snippet.description: Keeping your development skills up to date is tough work, especially when you don't have money for books or training. To help you fit more training into your tight budget, check ou...

snippet.title: Regular expressions: Variations in support
snippet.description: RE implementation has been deployed differently, depending on the environment. Here's a look at some of the variations in standards and conventions, along with resources for additi...

snippet.title: Book review: Essentially Jython misses mark for language novices
snippet.description: Jython is the hot new language, combining Python's rapid development capabilities with Java's tremendous resources. This book review of O'Reilly's "Jython Essentials" looks at the ...

snippet.title: Creating XML from MySQL is as easy as PI
snippet.description: It's easy to integrate MySQL data into an XML file, but importing XML into MySQL is a bit trickier. Learn how to export and import XML with the popular database MySQL.

snippet.title: Oh, my--MySQL!
snippet.description: If you are running a host Web site, the chances are good you have MySQL access. Discover when, where, and why you should use MySQL.

snippet.title: Get your Python resources here
snippet.description: Itching to find out more about the powerful, portable language Python? We've got you covered with a list of some of the best Python resources that the Web has to offer.

snippet.title: Windows Script Host tutorial: Pseudocode algorithms and other programming basics
snippet.description: Want to script your own Windows solutions? In this Drill Down by Greg Schultz, you'll learn some programming techniques that will help you prepare to script in VBScript or JScript.
